name: Fire Beam
description: Fires a sustained beam of energy, dealing damage to all enemies hit.

name: Vacuumulus
description: Emits a powerful shockwave around you, dealing damage to surrounding enemies and rocks.

name: Rain Cloud
description: Summon a cloud that waters any crops it travels over.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Shoots a bolt of lightning at an enemy, damaging them, and then jumping to additional nearby enemies.

name: Fireball
description: Fires a blast of flames, damaging and burning enemies.

name: Earthquake
description: Shake up the earth, instantly tilling land in an area around you.

name: Aegis
description: Increases Armor of all players on the same map and heals them over time.

name: Ethereal Axe
description: Summons a giant magical axe that swings in a large arc in front of you, dealing damage trees.

name: Bubble Net
description: Create an air bubble that floats forward, magically catching any fish that it travels over.

name: Cataclysm
description: Transform into a spinning ball, granting massive movement speed and causing heavy damage to all enemies you collide with during this time.

name: Rusty Key
description: An old rusty key, it looks like it opens gates in the mines.

name: Copper Key
description: A copper key crafted especially for the gates in the mines.

name: Wind Orb
description: "I must admit, Nivara was right... I had the potential to master this magic all along." - Vaan

name: Cobble Stone Bridge Decor
description: A sturdy cobble stone bridge for your farm.

name: Stone Bridge Decor
description: A sturdy stone bridge for your farm.

name: Wood Bridge Decor
description: A sturdy wooden bridge for your farm.

name: Arched Bridge Decor
description: A sturdy arched bridge for your farm.

name: Marble Bridge Decor
description: A sturdy marble bridge for your farm.

name: Elven Bridge Decor
description: A bridge crafted in the Elven style for your farm.

name: Spring Bridge Decor
description: A bridge crafted with a springtime flair for your farm.

name: Monster Bridge Decor
description: A bridge crafted in the Monsterfolk style for your farm.

name: Modern Bridge Decor
description: A bridge crafted in a modern style for your farm.

name: Zen Bridge Decor
description: A bridge crafted after the zen style of the lands across the eastern sea, for your farm.

name: Toy Bridge Decor
description: Every child's dream bridge! Crafted just for your farm.

name: Mushroom
description: There's a fungus among us.

name: Milk
description: Good for your bones.

name: Egg
description: It doesn't matter which came first, we're just happy they both showed up.

name: Egg Hash
description: Some delicious hash fried up perfectly with an egg.

name: Mashed Potatoes
description: Who would have thought mashed up potatoes would taste so irresistibly good?

name: Tomato Soup
description: If tomatoes are a fruit, is this technically a hot fruit smoothie?

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: A bowl of noodles dressed up nicely with an egg.

name: Bread
description: A simple loaf of oven-fresh bread.

name: Fried Carp
description: A lean and healthy meal of fried fish.

name: Apple
description: Crisp, sweet and great at keeping the doctor away.

name: Orange
description: Used to grow only in the warm Southern Isles, but adapted quite well to a more northern climate.

name: Blueberry
description: They're definitely blue and most assuredly berries, so the name checks out.

name: Tomato Bread
description: A spongey loaf of soft bread, it smells deliciously seasoned and savory.

name: Tortilla
description: A corn tortilla made of corn flour dough and baked over an open fire, it's like bread only... super flat.

name: Berry
description: A common berry, found almost everywhere in the forests.
